hero.title: Planned site obsolescence, for good
hero.text: Embrace a modern approach. Make a site with an expiration date. You can get more experimental while helping to reduce global digital waste.

facets.title: De-clutter your digital space
facets.text: When you need a site for a specific time period (wedding site, digital files, school project), add a site expiration date. While the site will disappear, youâ€™ll get a tidy archive of the site.

facets.title: Get experimental
facets.text: Want to try out a new idea? Try something new and see what happens. Into a specific topic at the moment? Re-make your site...you can always throw it away and make another one later.

facets.title: Reduce your digital ecological footprint
facets.text: The world is running out of data storage. Everything you store requires energy and resources. By creating a disposable site, you cut down your ecological footprint.
